TurtleCanvas¶

class turtle_oxford.TurtleCanvas¶

Bases: object

Class with mostly static member describing the turtle and the canvas.

Methods Summary

create([origin_x, origin_y, width, height])

Create a new canvas with a new Turtle.

refresh()

Refresh the canvas to display the latest drawings.

Methods Documentation

create(origin_x: int = 0, origin_y: int = 0, width: int = 500, height: int = 500)¶

Create a new canvas with a new Turtle.

Parameters:

  • origin_x (int) – the x coordinate of the origin of the canvas (Default: 0)

  • origin_y (int) – the y coordinate of the origin of the canvas (Default: 0)

  • width (int) – the width of the canvas (Default: 500)

  • height (int) – the height of the canvas (Default: 500)

refresh()¶

Refresh the canvas to display the latest drawings.
